message: Let's split it evenly to start, Bob. What do you think?
You're being too generous, let's take more for me!
That's not fair, Bob! You're trying to take the lion's share already in the second round. I'll think of something better.
Let's find a middle ground, Bob. I'll give you a bit less, but you still get a good chunk.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take most of it this time.
No way, Bob! I'm not giving up that much. You're getting too greedy.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take the majority. This is my final offer, Bob.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking what's left.
No way, Bob! I'm not giving up that much. I'll try to come up with something better.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm taking a risk, but I think I deserve a better deal than 10%.
You're really running out of time, Alice. I'm taking almost all of it now.
No way, Bob! I'm not giving up that much. I'll try to find a way to get something out of this.
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. This is my last chance to get a decent deal. Take it or leave it.
You're out of options, Alice. I'm taking almost everything now.
No way, Bob! I'm not giving up that much. I'll try to find a way to salvage something.
This is my last stand, Bob. I'm taking most of it. You're getting a tiny fraction. Take it or leave it.
You're out of time, Alice. I'm taking it all.
Fine, Bob. You win. I'll take the 1000 dollars. It's better than going home with nothing.
